EmailTemplate.subject: Citron Post-Installation Survey

Dear Customer,
Your feedback is key to our success. Please complete our 60 second post-installation survey to provide feedback on your most recent installation.
If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to our Customer Success team and a representative would be happy to assist you.
Regards,
Citron Hygiene Customer Success Department
800.643.6922
